MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  FK5 postcode area of Larbert, affecting properties in Stenhousemuir and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.32pm. Our engineers have arrived  on site at the Rae Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.59pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
